text: is a Japanese mountaineer. He is best known as the first Japanese man to reach the summits of the 14 tallest peaks in the Himalayas."Takeuchi becomes 1st Japanese to scale world's 14 highest peaks," Mainichi (Japan), May 27, 2012; retrieved 2012-5-27. Fewer than 30 people have climbed all 14 mountains. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1971 births Category:Japanese sportspeople Category:Mountain climbers
title: Hirotaka Takeuchi
